title: Comprehensive index analysis approach for ecological and human health risk assessment of a tributary river in Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Priyanka Dey Suchi, Md Aftab Ali Shaikh, Badhan Saha, Mohammad Moniruzzaman, Md Kamal Hossain, Afroza Parvin, Afsana Parvin
